import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/PopForm.css' import userFrame from '../icons/frame.png' import downarrw from '../icons/arrow-down.png' export default function DropMenu(props ){ const title=props.title return(
{title}
{props.showRoleMenu &&
    {props.options.map(option=>(
  • props.handleChange({option}) }>option
    • ))}
}
) }
